Darkfate::

Darkfate growled when he heards Drilbilt's and Killfest's com and he 
said to Scorponok "It seems that someone attacked my allies', by now 
we must reagroup and make a strategie..."

He used his comm link "To all my troops... Follow Drillbit's 
coordinates"

And looking to Scorponok, the dragon-bot said "I guess that you want 
to know what's going on with all details, we can speak while we 
reagroup with other's predacons" Darkfate changed to Beast mode "Up, 
It will be a quick fly, and you can know what's happening here...."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Scorponok looked thoughtful then responded straightening up 
again "Sort of
> sir, but I am not aware of the situation at the moment"
